ClassicThemeEntryAreaMargins.description:
This class stores the margins of entry areas for the classic theme.

For the classic theme, entry areas are (OneLineEntry)[../index.md#onelineentry],
(NormalEntry)[../index.md#normalentry], and
(ExperienceEntry)[../index.md#experienceentry].

ClassicThemeOptions.description:
This class stores the options for the classic theme.

In RenderCV, each theme has its own Pydantic class so that new themes
can be implemented easily in future.

primary_color.description:
The primary color of Classic Theme. It is used for the section titles, heading, and the links.
The color can be specified either with their [name](https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value.
primary_color.title: Primary Color

date_and_location_width.description: The width of the date and location column.
date_and_location_width.title: Date and Location Column Width

show_timespan_in.description: The time span will be shown in the date and location column in these sections. The input should be a list of strings.
show_timespan_in.title: Show Time Span in These Sections

show_last_updated_date.description: If this option is set to true, then the last updated date will be shown in the header.
show_last_updated_date.title: Show Last Updated Date

margins.description: Page, section title, entry field, and highlights field margins.
margins.title: Margins
